description:
One backpack for many outdoor pursuits. This versatile pack combines durable materials with a light aluminum frame for support. It's sized for epic days on the mountain or overnight trips when you don't quite need the kitchen sink.

  • Made entirely with durable recycled nylon ripstop
  • Top loading main compartment with front zipper for quick access to gear
  • Main compartment has two sleeve pockets and a zippered inside pocket
  • Adjustable harness and sternum strap offers a customized fit
  • Detachable top lid with bungy cord and two zippered pockets
  • Supportive hipbelt offers a comfortable carry while pockets stash snacks and other small essentials
  • Airmesh backpanel offers maximum airflow on hot days
  • Dual side mesh water bottles pockets
  • Attachment for trekking poles or ice axe
  • Included rain cover gives you weather protection whenever you need it
  • Hydration system compatible with hose port and routing strap (reservoir sold separately)
name: Fjallraven Abisko 35 Backpack - Unisex
